We're building a free financial platform that allows you to expand your margins.

generated_description:
Toolbox is a fintech startup with a mission: to help small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) thrive by offering a simplified yet powerful financial operating system. Founded in 2019 and based in New York, Toolbox is a part of the Y Combinator Batch S20 and has a compact team of just seven members.

The company is built around the idea that managing finances shouldn't be a hassle for business owners. Toolbox offers a range of services including corporate cards, cash management, and smart spend management‚Äîall designed to drive efficiency while saving money. They emphasize zero software fees, with some users able to earn up to 1.3% cash back on debit card spends. That's right; they actively encourage saving as you spend!

Their flagship offerings include flexible lines of credit, allowing businesses to access substantial funds without the burden of unnecessary fees. If you‚Äôre an established business with over $1 million in revenue, you might also qualify for Toolbox's corporate charge card, enabling you to free up cash flow significantly.

At Toolbox, they pride themselves on quick personalized onboarding sessions to get businesses set up and running with their financial tools‚Äîall on the same day. Their promise? More savings with less effort.

What‚Äôs the takeaway? Toolbox isn‚Äôt just about providing financial tools; it‚Äôs about engineering a comprehensive financial ecosystem for SMBs that streamlines operations, enhances cash flow, and ultimately helps businesses grow. If you‚Äôre looking for a smarter way to manage your operating cash, Toolbox might just be the solution you didn‚Äôt realize you needed.

Check them out at [trytoolbox.com](https://www.trytoolbox.com).
